item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: July 30, 2024 Today's Verse Exodus 20:16 [16] â€œYou shall not bear false witness against your neighbor. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable. 2 Corinthians 5:17 - Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation.
